import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./ShelterViewMyAnimals.scss"; import APIURL from "./APIURL"; const ShelterViewMyAnimals = () => { const [pets, setPets] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const makeAPICall = async () => { const response = await fetch(`${APIURL}/availablePets`); const data = await response.json(); console.log("data", data); setPets(data.availablePets); }; makeAPICall(); }, []); const searchPets = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch(`${APIURL}/petsSearch`, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ query: event.target.elements.searchInput.value, }), method: "POST", }); const data = await response.json(); setPets(data.Pets); }; return ( //remove container div & h1 - does that apply to me?

My Profile
{/* end of first row */}

{/* end of Pawsitivitea row */}
{!pets ? (

No pets yet...

) : ( // 27 Loop over each of the posts pets.map((eachPet, petIndex) => { // 28 Make the Post component show for each post from the DB //and pass the post info in a prop called data return (
{/* this is "Name" text that shows on screen */}
Name

{eachPet.name}

Description
{eachPet.description}
{/*

); }) )}

); }; export default ShelterViewMyAnimals;
